\subsection{Detailed Description}
Struct that represents the lower left position of a graphical object, but also the width, height and depth.\par
 \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1P300MainContainer}{P300MainContainer} redefines the OpenGL space so that 1 unit is 1 pixel and x=0,y=0 is the lower left corner of the screen.
